WindlordTermitron::

After told Deemos that Technosis was dead, Windlord re=
-started his fight, and he recieved a shot of  Barrymore and he fired her/h=
im 15 times; The hawk male fired 10 times against Alba and dificulty avoide=
d Stiller's arrows;

While Termitron fired 5 times against McGowan recived =
a shot; he dificulty avoided Lee's attack and he spat his acyd agaisnt him/=
her;  after that Termitron fired 5 times against Stiller. two of Ten Depp's=
 shot hits Termitron, who fired 15 times against him/her.



  (Depp fires =
10 shots at Termitron...)

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: airl=
y2000@... 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, May 28, =
2001 12:24 PM
    Subject: RE: War at Chivtron's base!!!


    OOC: Thanks =
to remember me that I have to post damage.

    IC:

    Windlord avoided m=
ost of the shots, but 3 shots of  Alba n a wing forced him to land. Windord=
 dodges others shots and dificulty he could.

    Termitron was hit  by Sti=
ller's shot and fell in ground but he stood up dificultly and shouted "BY T=
HE ROYALTY" and fired 5 times against  MCGowan, 5 against Barrymore, 5 agai=
nst Lee and 10 against STiller





      McGowan/Barrymore/Stiller/Lee/Alb=
a/Depp




      (McGowan dodges 5 of them, getting struck by 4. She fires =
2 missiles at Windlord.)



      (Alba dodges 6 shots and takes the other =
2 in the shoulder. She fires 8 shots at Windlord.)



      (Depp dodges th=
e shots and fires 3 shots at Windlord.)



      (Barrymore takes 7 of the =
shots, ducking the other 3. She fires 6 laser beams at Termitron.)



     =
 (Lee takes the rapids to the chest. Lee then fires 5 shots at Termitron.)
=



      (Stiller smiles and laughes. He fires 2 arrows at Windlord and 2 a=
rrows at Termitron...)
